alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 31 at 4:03AM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 13 inches possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and adjacent Plains of Platte and Goshen Counties. This includes the cities of Wheatland and Torrington. * WHEN...Sunday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
